title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki
content:
objects, and items, and... CAT EARS!

Bug Fixes and Improvements in Patch 8

Patch 8 also includes fixes to tackle a wide range of bugs, including visual bugs, Cerys's combat bugs, and issues when it comes to moving platforms during the Gauntlet of Shar. There are also improvements and fixes for Gameplay, Combat, Modding, Performance and Options, Scripting and Flow, Crashes, and more. There are also some reworks to Features and Spells, to address Combat and Balance across Acts, and certain Acts
